employees.notes: Proff reports 20 employees on the company profile; the extract does not clearly state the reference year for this headcount [1].

revenue.notes: Proff shows 2024 operating revenue "37 102" with amounts stated in thousands and currency NOK; converted to NOK 37,102,000 [1].

company.entity_resolution_notes: Proff lists the legal name and organisation number for an AS in Elverum, and Br�f8nn�f8ysund data shows the same organisation number and company form, confirming entity match [1][2].

srm_assessment.overall_summary: No direct evidence was found that the company uses recycled, recovered, reused, or waste-derived materials as inbound inputs. Available company pages describe alloy casting activities, and available norskeutslipp documentation is compliance-focused rather than inbound SRM-feedstock focused [3][4][5][6].
gaps_and_uncertainties: Publicly available company pages reviewed describe aluminium/copper/bronze casting processes but do not disclose recycled-content shares or secondary feedstock intake volumes [3][4][5].
Available norskeutslipp control documentation references permit/compliance topics and does not quantify inbound secondary raw material usage [6].
